# GitVersion example

Documentation: https://gitversion.net/docs/

Example of the generated variables:
```shell
Writing version variables to $GITHUB_ENV file for 'GitHubActions'.
{
  "AssemblySemFileVer": "0.0.1.0",
  "AssemblySemVer": "0.0.1.0",
  "BranchName": "main",
  "BuildMetaData": null,
  "CommitDate": "2024-10-30",
  "CommitsSinceVersionSource": 115,
  "EscapedBranchName": "main",
  "FullBuildMetaData": "Branch.main.Sha.373fcda7010cfe16d8cc9fbba5592a9414224a9a",
  "FullSemVer": "0.0.1-115",
  "InformationalVersion": "0.0.1-115+Branch.main.Sha.373fcda7010cfe16d8cc9fbba5592a9414224a9a",
  "Major": 0,
  "MajorMinorPatch": "0.0.1",
  "Minor": 0,
  "Patch": 1,
  "PreReleaseLabel": "",
  "PreReleaseLabelWithDash": "",
  "PreReleaseNumber": 115,
  "PreReleaseTag": "115",
  "PreReleaseTagWithDash": "-115",
  "SemVer": "0.0.1-115",
  "Sha": "373fcda7010cfe16d8cc9fbba5592a9414224a9a",
  "ShortSha": "373fcda",
  "UncommittedChanges": 0,
  "VersionSourceSha": "",
  "WeightedPreReleaseNumber": 55115
}
```
